FuncDef:
The start elaborate-sample command enables the refined sampling function for performance statistics tasks.
The undo start elaborate-sample command disables this function.
By default, the refined sampling function is disabled for performance statistics tasks.

ParaDef.Info:
Samples performance statistics at a second-level interval.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check process data and analyze module performance, run the start elaborate-sample command to enable the refined sampling function for performance statistics tasks and specify a second-level sampling interval for recording the process data. If this command is not run, the device does not record process data.
Prerequisites
Before the start elaborate-sample command is run, the task type has been set to historical by running the task-type mon-history command.
